response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. The value this product offers to you is estimated at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it can bring to your company, I am proposing to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a high-quality product at a competitive price, maximizing the value for your investment.

Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will be a valuable addition to your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
